description:
The story follows Suzume, a 17-year-old girl from a quiet Kyushu town who meets a young man looking for a door. They find a door within ruins in the mountain, and Suzume opens it. Soon, more doors begin to open around Japan, bringing disasters from the other side. The film depicts Suzume's liberation and growth, as she closes the doors that are causing disaster.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: การผนึกประตูของซุซุเมะ

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Kaiju
tags.description: Prominently features giant monsters.

tags.name: Natural Disaster
tags.description: It focuses on catastrophic events of natural origin, such as earthquakes, tsunamis,  volcanic eruptions, and severe storms. These works often present situations of extreme danger in which the characters struggle to survive and overcome the adversity.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

title.native: ビッグマック®と、すすめ！

node.description:
__[Website](http://www.shinkaiworks.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shinkaimakoto)__

A Japanese director, writer, producer, animator, editor, cinematographer, voice actor, manga artist, and former graphic designer. He is best known for directing _Kimi no Na wa_, and was listed by Variety as one of 10 animators to watch in 2016. However, he was displeased with the amount of attention and wide recognition the film got, as he felt that it was unfinished.

Asteroid 55222 Makotoshinkai is named after him.

[Website](https://www.kazumajinnouchi.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kazjin2612) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kazjin2612/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/2UM9kTNJPoOHuN4yeDT54i?si=DoouJseMTge-lP6B2PYLhg)

Kazuma Jinnouchi is Japanese music composer based in Seattle and Los Angeles. He is best known for composing the music of Microsoft’s blockbuster video game Halo 5: Guardians., for which he received BAFTA Games Awards nomination in Best Music category; as well as the critically-acclaimed video game Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots.

RADWIMPS is a Japanese alternative rock band formed in Kanagawa, Japan.

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/radwimps.official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/radwimps_jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/radwimps) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/radwimpsstaff) | [Website](https://radwimps.jp/)

[Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/DublandoCoisas) | [Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/dublandocoisas) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/DublandoCoisas)

Lucas Almeida is a Brazilian actor, director and voice actor. He is married to [Mayara Stefane](https://anilist.co/staff/197179/).
